meanings.definition: A person who lives in a suburb.
meanings.sent1: Many suburbanites enjoy the quiet neighborhoods and green spaces.
meanings.sent2: The suburbanites commuted to the city for work every day.
meanings.sent3: The suburbanites organized a block party to get to know their neighbors better.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of suburbanites, she stood out with her colorful house.
meanings.sent5: The suburbanites gathered at the park for a picnic under the sunny sky.

meanings.sent1: The suburbanites chatted happily at the community event.
meanings.sent2: We waved to the group of suburbanites walking their dogs.
meanings.sent3: The suburbanites formed a line at the food truck, eager for a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: Among the suburbanites, he was known for his impressive garden.
meanings.sent5: The suburbanites exchanged gardening tips over the fence on a warm afternoon.
